title: Director of Software Engineering
tagline: Director-level engineering leader who builds high-performing teams and delivers reliable, cloud-native platforms that align with business strategy.
whatIDo: Seasoned engineering leader with 21+ years in software development and 5+ years leading multi-team organizations. I drive enterprise platform and product initiatives—translating business strategy into durable technical roadmaps—focusing on cloud-native, API-first microservices and enterprise-grade reliability. I establish operating rhythms and modern SDLC/CI-CD practices, partner across product, security, and operations, and develop managers and engineers to deliver measurable outcomes such as cost reductions, improved throughput, and higher service reliability.
featured: Lead multi-team engineering organizations to deliver enterprise platform roadmaps
Design and operate cloud-native, API-first microservices with enterprise reliability
Align cross-functional stakeholders and translate strategy into technical delivery
Build and coach managers and engineers; scale hiring and inclusive culture
Drive measurable outcomes: cost savings, SDLC improvements, and platform reliability
